name: get_storage_policy_assignments
description: Fetches all the storage policy assignment for an enterprise or user.

marker.description:
Defines the position marker at which to begin returning results. This is
used when paginating using marker-based pagination.

This requires `usemarker` to be set to `true`.

resolved_for_type.description: The target type to return assignments for

resolved_for_id.description: The ID of the user or enterprise to return assignments for
